nodes.text: The Lahara sector was located in the Outer Rim Territories and was a member of the Galactic Republic leading up to the Separatist movement. The planet Agamar and the moon Gandolo IV were located in Lahara sector. The sector contained 245 settled worlds, most of which were primarily agricultural.
The sector bordered the Cowl Crucible in the Oricho sector.
Lahara was represented in the Galactic Senate by Tyreca Bremack. Citing high taxes, the Lahara sector seceded from the Republic shortly before the Clone Wars.

On 13:5:15, the Iron Tether, a Space Rescue Corps patrol cutter, was attacked by Separatist extremists while on a routine patrol mission of the Cowl Crucible on the the border of the Lahara sector, prompting a Jedi task force led by Master Darrin Arkanian to be dispatched to the area.
During the Galactic Civil War, the Lahara sector was overseen by an Imperial sector governor.
